title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Collections options settings enhancements (U.S. Government clouds)
description: ,Now eDiscovery admins can define default collection settings, enable eDiscovery managers to customize those defaults for each case and collection, and for each collection the eDiscovery manager can choose from a range of options to ensure the right content is collected per the requirements of the case. These options will include collection of cloud attachments, Teams as conversations, partially indexed items, and more.
